intent_analysis:
Intent: The user expects the automation of turning on a light strip located in the dining room when the refrigerator door is opened.  
Constraints & cues: The command does not specify which of the available light strips in the dining room should be activated, and there are multiple light strips present, with one currently off.  
Risk assessment: There is ambiguity regarding which specific light strip in the dining room to activate, which could lead to unintended actions if not clarified.
